id: Only A True Music Genius Will Be Able To Remember These Divas' Debut Singles
paragraph:
Do you recall the hits that started it all?
        
        "...Baby One More Time"
      Britney released the '90s anthem way back in October 1998!
        "Pon de Replay"
      Rihanna released this bop in May 2005!
        "Reflection"
      Christina released this in June 1998, and it was the title track for Disney's Mulan.
        "Massive Attack"
      After featuring on many Young Money hits, Nicki released this much anticipated single in April 2010.
        "Vision Of Love"
      Mariah released this iconic ballad in May 1990.
        "Work It Out"
      This hit was released in June 2002 as the title track of Austin Powers: Goldmember, which Beyoncé starred in.
        "Put Your Hearts Up"
      Ariana was still filming Nickelodeon's Victorious when she released her debut single in December 2011.
        "Tim McGraw"
      Taylor wrote this song when she was a high school freshman, and it was released way back in June 2006.BuzzFeed HomeSitemap© 2018 BuzzFeed, Inc.
